Description: The experts at Liana Technologies would be happy to tell you more about marketing automation and figure out how you could nurture leads, win customer loyalty or create a steady flow of inbounds.
Name: LianaCEM

Methods.Name: Search Result - Contacts
Methods.Description: Fetch unique Contact search results of a finished request.

Methods.Name: Search Ready
Methods.Description: Check if a requested database search has completed. If it has leave through the True Exit, otherwise leave through the False Exit.

Methods.Name: Search Result
Methods.Description: Fetch search results of a finished request.

Methods.Name: Search Request - Get New Data
Methods.Description: Make a database search request for new data since the last run.

Methods.Name: Search Result - Events
Methods.Description: Fetch unique Event search results of a finished request.

Methods.Name: Import Data
Methods.Description: Bring data to LianaCEM from external systems. Field locations for custom fields begin with [data].[events].items for example [data].[events].items.customfield1

Methods.Name: Delete Ready
Methods.Description: Check if a delete request has finished. If it has leave through the True Exit, otherwise leave through the False Exit.

Methods.Name: Delete Request
Methods.Description: Request data to be deleted from database.

Methods.Name: Delete Result
Methods.Description: Returns CEM system ID of the deleted items.

Methods.Name: Export Result
Methods.Description: Export results of a finished export request.

Methods.Name: Export Request
Methods.Description: Make a request to export the contents of a given segment.

Methods.Name: Export Ready
Methods.Description: Check if an export request is ready.
